## Gene Details:
- **MSU gene ID:** [LOC_Os04g44620](http://rice.uga.edu/cgi-bin/ORF_infopage.cgi?orf=LOC_Os04g44620)  
- **RAPdb gene ID:** [Os04g0528400](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/locus/?name=Os04g0528400)  
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>OsHUS1</u>
- **Genome:**  [MSU7](http://rice.uga.edu/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[IRGSP-1.0](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/download/irgsp1.html)
- **Species:** *Oryza sativa*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - **OsHUS1** facilitates accurate meiotic recombination in rice.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [meiotic-recombination](/tags/meiotic-recombination/)

## Literature:
